title: Raised game pie
description: A game pie always makes a spectacular centrepiece and this handsome example is amazingly straightforward to make – especially if you buy mixed game meat ready-prepared from a good butcher.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 20cm/8in spring-form cake tin, about 7cm/2¾in deep.
ingredients: 700g/1lb 9oz mixed, boned, diced game meat, such as venison, rabbit, pheasant, pigeon and boar
75g/2½oz cold, unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in dice
1 free-range egg yolk, beaten, to glaze
